Comments: Started by V.K. Kayee, popularly known as Kayikka was a cook and waiter in British army. Inr 1948 he started a tea stall in Mattancherry and later it converted into a proper restaurant named Kayees Rahmathulla hotel.

Address: Kannur Road | Near CH Flyover, Calicut
Comments: Founded in 1939, famous for Fish Curry and Biriyani
